Report.SearchSQL: SELECT slc.[SoftwareLicenseContractID] ,slc.[SoftwareLicenseID] ,sli.[Name] as [LicenseName] ,sli.[Version] as [LicenseVersion] ,sli.[Edition] as [LicenseEdition] ,slc.[ContractID] ,ci.[ContractNo] ,ci.[ContractName] ,ci.[ContractTypeDefaultValue] as [ContractType] ,ci.[VendorName] as [ContractVendor] FROM dbo.[SoftwareLicenseContract] as slc JOIN dbo.[SoftwareLicenseInfo] as sli on sli.[SoftwareLicenseID] = slc.[SoftwareLicenseID] JOIN dbo.[ContractInfo] as ci on ci.ContractID = slc.[ContractID]
